input_descriptions.input_data: A string representing the main goal of the chain.
input_descriptions.input_goal: A string representing the main goal of the code task.
input_descriptions.specific_info: An optional string containing any specific information to consider during code generation.

output_descriptions.output_code: A string containing the generated code based on the input goals and specific information.
output_descriptions.status: True or False depending on if code is generated properly.
